case_circumstances: This man was dropped off at the emergency room of Martin Luther King Medical Center in Los Angeles on 10/09/2006.  He was unconscious and his friend said he overdosed on drugs and that his name was Salvador Jimanaz.  No family was ever located and he never re-gained consciousness.  He was transferred to a board and care facility where he died.  We have been unable to establish his true identity.
case_head_hair: worn short, about one to two inches long
case_facial_hair: thin scraggly mustache (unknown if he wore it that way or just unshaved by hospital staff)
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is available and entered
case_clothing_on_body: no clothing, he was in hospital and wore only pajamas
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
